episodes.title: The Lori Vallow Interview // The Scar Wars Podcast EP 3
episodes.description:
In this episode I called my mom Lori Vallow. I had a lot of questions, so I decided to interview her. Our conversation was all over the place, but she reveals things she has never said before. I asked her a lot of questions, but there was still a lot more to be asked. This interview is very heavy to watch, so I am warning you now. With all that being said, please share your thoughts. 

https://linktr.ee/colbyjryan
